title: Rules governing Hawaii educator loan program
context: ยง304A-704 Rules governing Hawaii educator loan program revolving fund. The university may adopt rules to implement the Hawaii educator loan program. The rules shall be adopted pursuant to chapter 91 but shall be exempt from the public notice and public hearing requirements. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2; am L 2015, c 106, ยง5]
